name: DooTV limited
overview:
DooTV Thai entertainment website has been launched in response to Thai people in foreign countries (outside Thailand) demanding who would like to keep their eyes on news or entertainment programmes from Thailand television stations. Our DooTV site is one of the most massive stock of entertainment programmes from every channel through user interface which has been designed for easy-looking and ease of use.

According to maximum customer satisfaction, DooTV provides after sale service which is 24/7 call centre to serve our customers needs and their emotions as their friend at home. Our DooTV customers will get impressive quality entertainment programmes on demand all day and all night. Moreover customers can receive our media not only real time TV programmes or some entertainment programmes but also all entertainment programmes which have been played. DooTV keep it for our customers.

Customers will watch online through the best quality media both picture and sound which DooTV absolutely confident to guarantee. DooTV is the fastest TV online entertainment program updater. Our customers will never miss their favourite news, well known Thai on-air series, funniest sit-coms, hottest series and interesting TV programmes.
